original_text: The first living creature was like a lion, the second was like an ox, the third had a face like a man, the fourth was like a flying eagle.
korean_text: 그 첫째 생물은 사자 같고 그 둘째 생물은 송아지 같고 그 셋째 생물은 얼굴이 사람 같고 그 넷째 생물은 날아가는 독수리 같은데

sentences.original_text: The first living creature was like a lion
the second was like an ox
the third had a face like a man
the fourth was like a flying eagle
